name: Chicken Soup
description: A comforting bowl of chicken soup, filled with tender chicken pieces, vegetables, and aromatic spices. Perfect for a soothing and delicious meal.

name: Coffee
description: A rich and aromatic cup of coffee brewed to perfection. Savor the robust flavor and kickstart your day with this energizing beverage.

name: Fuska
description: A popular street food delicacy, Fuska is a crispy and hollow puri filled with a spicy and tangy mixture of tamarind water, mashed potatoes, and chickpeas.

name: Mutton Biriyani
description: Indulge in the exquisite flavors of Mutton Biriyani, a fragrant rice dish cooked with succulent mutton pieces, aromatic spices, and basmati rice.

name: Chicken Biriyani
description: Experience the tantalizing taste of Chicken Biriyani, a delightful blend of flavorful basmati rice, tender chicken, and aromatic spices. A true culinary delight.

name: Burger
description: Sink your teeth into a juicy and mouthwatering burger, complete with a succulent patty, fresh vegetables, and a dollop of savory sauce. A classic favorite!

name: Pizza
description: Indulge in a slice of heaven with our delicious Pizza. Topped with gooey cheese, flavorful tomato sauce, and your favorite toppings, it's a taste sensation!
